Detailed Description

C++ Primitive component abstract class.

This class is extended by each primitive template class generated by NMF tools according your ADL description.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Component state.

State of the component, for proper lifecycle management (see stop_flush()).

Field Documentation

t_uint32 NMF::Primitive::mutexHandle

This mutex allow to prevent parallel scheduling on multiple core.

Warning:
This variable is used internally, you must not use it.
const char* NMF::Primitive::name

ADL declaration name.

Debug information containing the ADL declaration name of the component.
